alert.note: Alert for Baker; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:05PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BAKER...NORTHERN CLAY AND SOUTHWESTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 204 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maxville, or 9 miles northwest of Middleburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Middleburg, Mandarin, Maxville, Fleming Island, Oakleaf Plantation, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, Cecil Field, Doctors Inlet, and Lakeside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
